attributes.action: Dont arrest low income working peoples wages for council tax
attributes.additional_details: refugees get free electric free accomidation £200 and dont pay council tax !! make it fair we didnt ask for them .
attributes.background: lets make it fair for people who have PAID IN that cant afford everything all the time . we didnt ask to pay refugees  bills so that we could get poorer !  am ok with them if its fair but its not .

rejection.details: You could start a new petition asking for a clear action.
